thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 55 of 63
thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text:
I love SSENSE. They typically have a great buy from brands that I love. They ship extremely quickly. Their customer service line is quick and responsive. I have not had a bad experience with them yet.
The only con I can think of is that during sale season they will sometimes fluctuate pricing. So something can be 50% off one day, and then only 30% off the next. If you see something for a price you like, probably best to pull the trigger.
